This game is terrible. Creators have no idea how to balance the game and are constantly getting involved in scandals or controversies with the community and its creators. Also if you want to play anyone besides the 4 base killers and survivors, you will NEED to spend money on this game, or just grind for 30 levels to get enough ingame currency to buy someone seperately. 3/10 game needs work.

Because of the fact that it's mostly random maps and people you pair with, there is no guarantee you will win every time, leveling the playing field. Also, there is no pay-to- play, or pay-to-win, you just have your own skill. Sometimes, the game seems super rough and it's not fun. You seem to die to fast. But sometimes, you get a good team of players that help and cooperate. Definite need to have your own little group to play with, if you want to coordinate better.

It's a fun game despite being repetitive. I just hate that there are people who puppy guard survivors and tunnel them. I just wished they were penalized not just by receiving less blood points but by something else. So the killer who was puppy guarding should get reduced speed and longer cool down for a couple of seconds so the survivor that was just unhooked after getting puppy guarded could be free and actually be able to play the game. Or even make the killer go blind if he puppy guards.

I don't know why i still play the game,maybe i like to torture myself because it's so unbalanced:
1.why do survivors have any kind of immunity
2.why do they even have perks since they are 4 and faster(they  should have some barely noticeable perks)
3.why there are 3 escape routes(including hatch) IT'S 1 GODDAMN KILLER.and even at one gate u can barely catch them cuz:
   4.body blocking is op and retarded.If they make a wall in front of me i should be able to hurt them all with a normal or strong attack
5.there's like no delay whatsoever when jumping windows or pallets and if it is it's close to useless
6.if u play against a full co-op team you have 0 % chance to even touch them since they can comm on discord and always know where are you,so coop more than 2 shouldn't be allowed
7.WHY IS BODYBLOCKING THE HOOK ALLOWED?
8.and again WHY DO SURVIVORS HAVE ANY KIND IMMUNITY?
People call you tunneler because u prioritize them instead  of wasting time searching for other player

Desde que metieron el nuevo sistema de MMR el juego se hizo una tortura, despues de estar 3 meses sin jugar decidÃ­ volver a darle una chance, por alguna razÃ³n el juego me pone en contra de los SWF mas toxicos y tryhard que vi desde que arranque a jugar, 
No lo recomiendo para alguien que tiene una vida y no puede ni quiere tomarse el juego de la misma forma que las ratas que juegan ahora, ojala colocaran dos match making diferentes para la gente casual y la gente que por alguna razÃ³n piensan que hay un coach de e-sports mirando sus partidas y listos para reclutarlos y sacarlos de LATAM, pero lamentablemente los cambios necesarios son los que nunca van a hacerle al juego ya que requiere que los devs laburen y es pedirles demasiado.

My friend asked me yesterday "Why do we keep playing that game, we do nothing but complain" and I haven't stopped thinking about it since

Pros :
- You can basically play this forever
- A bad game is like 2 minutes
- 15-20 minutes a game
- Nice soundtrack while you wait to find a match

Cons :
- Unless you're playing with friends or good players, you're not really playing WITH your teammates, you just happen to have the same goal
- Killers have the ability to be incredibly toxic
- Survivors have the ability to be absolutely useless or trolls
- Devs couldn't care less about the legit issues with this game
- Insidious Bubba
- Useless report button that you only use "just in case they decide to actually do something"
- If you play past 7pm GMT, it takes a long time to find a game
- The game is heavily survivor oriented at the very beginning and very heavily killer oriented once you actually begin to be good at the game, the only moment it can go either way is when you're intermediate level

All in all, the only time you can truly enjoy this game is when you have a full team and you all have the same level. Otherwise, this game is incredibly frustrating and I wouldn't wish it upon anyone I care about

Like, I'm still gonna play it but you shouldn't

Ich habe Ã¼ber 1000 Stunden Dead by Daylight gespielt. Die meiste Zeit habe ich viel SpaÃŸ gehabt und mit der Zeit lernt man ein Spiel auch lieben. Dies war die meiste Zeit der Fall. Seit einigen Monaten aber hat sich das Spiel in so vielen verschiedenen Arten verschlechtert, dass ich mich gezwungen sehe, es zu deinstallieren und die Finger davon zu lassen. ZusÃ¤tzlich zu der furchtbaren Balance in den perks und maps, die davor schon existiert, hat Behavior es geschafft, auch das matchmaking System zu versauen. Durch das neue "casual" matchmaking hat das Spiel jegliche Langzeit-Motivation verloren. Dazu bleibt die MMR, die man bekommt, auch nach Monaten Abstinenz bestehen, sodass man nach langer Zeit ohne Dead by Daylight trotzdem noch gegen Killer ran muss, die auf hÃ¶chstem Niveau spielen. Dies sorgt dafÃ¼r, dass es einfach nur noch frustrierend ist und keine SpaÃŸ mehr macht.
